name: The Reincarnated King of Fists
author: YKB &#40임경배&#41
content: In a world where humans enslave non-human species, the powerful wizard Leppenhardt creates an empire to safeguard these beings. However, his reign ends when he&#039s defeated by the brutally strong Tesron, the &quotKing of Fists.&quot But death isn’t the end, because Leppenhardt awakens in Tesron&#039s young body! Now armed with incredible strength and a new identity, he sets off to free the non-human races again. Can the new King of Fists reshape the world for all, or will his second chance sli
